DOC.brief_title: Effects Dry Needling Using Spinal Peripheral Sites Versus Peripheral Sites Only
DOC.detailed_description: This study determine spinal peripheral dry needle site result decrease pain , increase muscle strength , increased proprioception increase functional performance among individual chronic musculoskeletal condition low extremity , plantar fasciitis , Achilles tendinopathy , patellofemoral pain syndrome . Specific aim determine individual chronic musculoskeletal condition low extremity receive dry needle spinal peripheral site exhibit difference pain , muscle strength , proprioception , unilateral hop test score compare individual chronic musculoskeletal condition low extremity receive dry needle peripheral site .
